title: Eldritch Knight
content: pell Slot Make a creature larger or smaller to affect their weapon damage and Strength. 9m CON Save Concentration Flaming Sphere Level 2 Conjuration Action Level 2 Spell Slot 2d6Fire Summon a flaming sphere that damages nearby enemies and objects. You can move the sphere. It emits a bright light.10 turnsOn Save: Targets still take half damage. 18m DEX Save Concentration Gust of Wind Level 2 Evocation Action Level 2 Spell Slot Summon a strong wind that clears all sounds and pushes creatures back
